delete_api_key_text: Are you sure you wish to delete this API key? All requests using it will immediately be invalidated and will fail.
no_api_keys_exist: No API keys exist for this account.
2fa_required_text: Your account must have two-factor authentication enabled in order to continue.
new_api_key_text: The API key you have requested is shown below. Please store this in a safe location, it will not be shown again.
no_others_server: There are no other servers to display.
no_own_server: There are no servers associated with your account.
2fa_currently_enabled: Two-factor authentication is currently enabled on your account.
2fa_currently_disabled: You do not currently have two-factor authentication enabled on your account. Click the button below to begin configuring it.
description_text: A description of this API key.
allowed_ips_text: Leave blank to allow any IP address to use this API key, otherwise provide each IP address on a new line.
need_current_password: You must provide your current password in order to continue.
disable_2fa_text: In order to disable two-factor authentication you will need to provide your account password.
need_authentication_code: You must provide an authentication code to continue.
2fa_enabled_text1: Two-factor authentication has been enabled on your account. Should you loose access to this device you'll need to use on of the codes displayed below in order to access your account.
2fa_enabled_text2: These codes will not be displayed again.
2fa_enabled_text3: Please take note of them now by storing them in a secure repository such as a password manager.
2fa_code_text: Enter the code from your authenticator device after scanning the QR image.
email_updated: Your Email Address has been updated.
password_confirmation_not_match: Password confirmation does not match the password you entered.
new_password_description: Your new password should be at least 8 characters in length and unique to this website.
search_min_characters: Please enter at least three characters to begin searching.
search_description: Enter a server name, uuid, or allocation to begin searching.
